00002 #define TLM_HELPERS_HEADER

00007 enum tlm_endianness { TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN, TLM_BIG_ENDIAN };
00008 
00009 inline bool hostHasLittleEndianness()
00010 {
00011 #if defined(__sparc) || defined(macintosh) || defined(__hppa) || defined(__APPLE__)
00012 
00013   return false; // HOST IS BIG ENDIAN
00014 
00015 #elif defined(__acorn) || defined(__mvs) || defined(_WIN32) || \
00016   (defined(__alpha) && defined(__osf__)) || defined(__i386)
00017 
00018   return true; // HOST IS LITTLE ENDIAN
00019 
00020 #else
00021 
00022   return (__BYTE_ORDER == __LITTLE_ENDIAN);
00023 
00024 #endif
00025 }
00026 
00027 inline bool hasHostEndianness(tlm_endianness endianness)
00028 {
00029   if (hostHasLittleEndianness()) {
00030     return endianness == TLM_LITTLE_ENDIAN;
00031 
00032   } else {
00033     return endianness == TLM_BIG_ENDIAN;
00034   }
00035 } 
00036 
00037 inline unsigned char swap_bytes(unsigned char rhs)  { return rhs; }
00038 inline char swap_bytes(char rhs) { return rhs; }
00039 inline signed char swap_bytes(signed char rhs) { return rhs; }
00040 
00041 inline unsigned short swap_bytes(unsigned short rhs) { return (rhs >> 8) | (rhs << 8); }
00042 inline signed short swap_bytes(signed short rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned short)rhs); }
00043 
00044 inline unsigned int swap_bytes(unsigned int rhs) { return (rhs << 24) | (rhs >> 24) | ((rhs << 8) & 0x00FF0000) | ((rhs >> 8) & 0x0000FF00); }
00045 inline signed int swap_bytes(signed int rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned int)rhs); }
00046 
00047 inline unsigned long swap_bytes(unsigned long rhs) { return (rhs << 24) | (rhs >> 24) | ((rhs << 8) & 0x00FF0000) | ((rhs >> 8) & 0x0000FF00); }
00048 inline signed long swap_bytes(signed long rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned long)rhs); }
00049 
00050 inline unsigned long long swap_bytes(unsigned long long rhs) { return (static_cast<unsigned long long>(swap_bytes((unsigned long)rhs)) << 32) | swap_bytes((unsigned long)(rhs >> 32)); }
00051 inline signed long long swap_bytes(signed long long rhs) { return swap_bytes((unsigned long long)rhs); }
00052

00054 
00055 //
00056 // Copy data from src / dest
00057 // swaps the bytes if needed (simulated endianness != host endianness)
00058 //
00059 inline void copy_data(const unsigned char* src, unsigned char* dest,
00060                       unsigned int nrOfBytes, tlm_endianness endianness)
00061 {
00062   if (hasHostEndianness(endianness)) {
00063     memcpy(dest, src, nrOfBytes);
00064 
00065   } else {
00066     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nrOfBytes; ++i) {
00067       dest[i] = src[nrOfBytes - 1 - i];
00068     }
00069   }
00070 }
00071 
00072 //
00073 // Swap bytes if needed (simulated endianness != host endianness)
00074 //
00075 template <typename DT>
00076 inline DT swapIfNeeded(DT word, tlm_endianness endianness)
00077 {
00078   if (hasHostEndianness(endianness)) {
00079     return word;
00080 
00081   } else {
00082     return swap_bytes(word);
00083   }
00084 }
